SELECT a.id as userId, a.cellphone, b.user_name as userName, CONCAT(#{fastdfsUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},c.file_group,'/',c.attach_path) as img
,d.user_name as companyUserName,d.email,d.company_id as companyId
FROM maoding_web_account a LEFT JOIN maoding_web_user b on a.id= b.id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_user_attach c on c.user_id = a.id AND c.attach_type=5
LEFT JOIN maoding_web_company_user d on a.id = d.user_id and d.id = #{companyUserId}
where a.id =#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} Limit 1
